channel.title: Help with combat xp rates? 718 panic pvp 718
channel.description:
so guys when i go into my settings.java this is what i see..... http://gyazo.com/dc622206b30c3a583b503f9510e1f77c
but the skilling xp rates change but not the combat xp rates... so what i did was added this ..... http://gyazo.com/9777d3ac3efbd6d6deaf21bd77b0aa59
for those of you who cant see the change.... abovve the xp rate i added a combat xp rate... and compiled YES I COMPILED still no changes to the server combat xp rate.. PLEASE GUYS HELP.... no one will play if the xp rates are runescape xp rates...
Thanks in advance guys <3
